channel.title: Writing on Regina Collins' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Regina Collins' Blog

item.title: Technical Writing
item.description: To better illustrate my technical communication skills, I have included some examples of my work from my Master of Professional and Technical Communication. CorpCommCollab brochure - I designed this brochure to serve as a marketing tool for a collaborative wiki created by all the students in the Corporate Communication seminar. The brochure is designed to be visually appealing and to provide sufficient information to create interest in our collaborative wiki.
